title: How to Kill Neptune in Resident Evil

steps.headline: Go up to Neptune after draining the Aqua Ring.
Walk past him and stand on the platform.
steps.description: There will be a cut scene where he starts thrashing around wildly.

steps.headline: Kill him.
steps.description:
There are two ways:
Firepower Method: Shoot him with any weapon until he dies. Electrocution Method: Push the greenish box into the water, then flip the lever near by. This is recommended because it saves ammo and you get to see a shark fried.

steps.headline: Get down from the platform and collect the Gallery Key by his body.

text:
Go up to Neptune after draining the Aqua Ring. He is still alive. Walk past him and stand on the platform. There will be a cut scene where he starts thrashing around wildly. Kill him. There are two ways:
Firepower Method: Shoot him with any weapon until he dies. Electrocution Method: Push the greenish box into the water, then flip the lever near by. This is recommended because it saves ammo and you get to see a shark fried. Get down from the platform and collect the Gallery Key by his body.
